metadata.title: CVE-2018-13982 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Smarty_Security::isTrustedResourceDir() in Smarty before 3.1.33 is prone toa path traversal vulnerability due to insufficient template codesanitization. This allows attackers controlling the executed template codeto bypass the trusted directory security restriction and read arbitraryfiles.

criterions.comment: smarty3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
